description: EndpointPort is a tuple that describes a single port.

protocol.description: The IP protocol for this port. Must be UDP, TCP, or SCTP. Default is TCP.

name.description: The name of this port.  This must match the 'name' field in the corresponding ServicePort. Must be a DNS_LABEL. Optional only if one port is defined.

appProtocol.description: The application protocol for this port. This field follows standard Kubernetes label syntax. Un-prefixed names are reserved for IANA standard service names (as per RFC-6335 and http://www.iana.org/assignments/service-names). Non-standard protocols should use prefixed names such as mycompany.com/my-custom-protocol. Field can be enabled with ServiceAppProtocol feature gate.

port.description: The port number of the endpoint.
